I‚Äôm outraged. Attacking trans kids and their parents, who support and love them for exactly who they are, is shameful and cruel

We need to stand up for trans kids, their parents, and the trans community. They matter and deserve love and respect. We need to have their backs https://t.co/Z8lxrhQJwy

It‚Äôs time for Maryland to get unregistered, deadly, homemade ghost guns off our streets. It‚Äôs time for Maryland to lead.

It‚Äôs time to take action to save lives. https://t.co/BR09kC7Gku

 https://t.co/RF8KVBflBn

https://t.co/dFnEVGBytj
Disrespectful, unbecoming, and disgusting https://t.co/uLNKdqadrD

So many Americans have marched and died for our right to vote. It‚Äôs foundational to who we are as a country and the future we hope to build together

It‚Äôs time we went on the offensive, to defend voting rights wherever they are threatened https://t.co/YTV5OCfuEQ

Americans need to know their lawmakers are fighting for them, not lining their own pocketbooks

She fought for justice, dignity and the right to vote. She worked tirelessly to change minds and laws #BlackHistoryMonth https://t.co/OUfm13i83E

A strong, forward-looking State of the State response from @Willcsmithjr 

Congress has sent states historic funding for our recovery. It‚Äôs time for MD to get proactive - to ensure safer communities, invest in families, build quality infrastructure and create good-paying jobs

Supporting mental health builds safer communities

Providing greater funding for mental health workers ensures MDers in crisis get the help they need from trained professionals and allows law enforcement to focus on violent crime. This is common sense and vital https://t.co/t7PpVVViNt

We‚Äôre #BuildingABetterAmerica together.

Rebuilding crumbling roads and bridges

Modernizing our transit systems

And reconnecting communities divided by decades of bad infrastructure policy

I served in Germany during the end of the Cold War and witnessed first-hand how our cooperation with NATO and European allies was essential to constraining Soviet power

We need that same resolve to deter Putin‚Äôs aggression and ensure stability in Europe at this key moment https://t.co/WnUtH2dcYn

49 years after Roe, SCOTUS is prepared to take us back to the dangerous status quo that cost women their lives. We must fight this https://t.co/1C0VUIlEIN

I am an American

The millions of Black men and women who have served in uniform are Americans

As @POTUS said today, ‚ÄúOur democracy held. We the people endured. We the people prevailed.‚Äù

https://t.co/cuxTlKrvrM

Governor Hogan isn‚Äôt above the basic expectations of public service

We must do more to end gun violence. We must do more to get weapons out of the hands of unstable individuals. We have to do more https://t.co/Chftqk1kgW

This NDAA had funding for our military families and measures to promote diversity. I fought hard for those

But I can‚Äôt support inaction to counter extremism or address racial bias in our military justice system. We value justice & equity. That‚Äôs what we need to lead with https://t.co/4GUZCk0QB5

I served in uniform for 30 years, have sat on the House Armed Services Committee for 5 years, and have voted for the NDAA every time

This year, I can‚Äôt vote for this bill, which doesn‚Äôt address these critical issues. I will vote no on the #FY22NDAA 

https://t.co/C21t0QpD47

If we don‚Äôt take this moment and act decisively, we fail the communities who elected us and our duty to our servicemembers
